prompt:
Schrijf een user story in Gherkin-formaat voor de volgende requirement:
            
            Requirement: Project management interface
            
            Geef een user story met:
            - Feature beschrijving
            - Scenario's met Given/When/Then
            - Acceptatiecriteria
            - Prioriteit (High/Medium/Low)
answer:
```gherkin
Feature: Project management interface

  In order to effectively manage projects
  As a project manager
  I want to have a user-friendly interface that allows me to create, update, and track projects.

  Scenario: Create a new project
    Given I am logged in as a project manager
    When I navigate to the project management interface
    And I fill in the project name as "Website Redesign"
    And I set the project deadline to "2023-12-31"
    And I click on the "Create Project" button
    Then I should see a confirmation message "Project created successfully"
    And the project "Website Redesign" should be listed in my projects

  Scenario: Update an existing project
    Given I have an existing project named "Website Redesign"
    When I navigate to the project management interface
    And I click on the project "Website Redesign"
    And I update the project deadline to "2024-01-15"
    And I click on the "Save Changes" button
    Then I should see a confirmation message "Project updated successfully"
    And the project deadline should be updated to "2024-01-15"

  Scenario: Track project progress
    Given I have an existing project named "Website Redesign"
    When I navigate to the project management interface
    And I click on the project "Website Redesign"
    Then I should see the project details including the name, deadline, and current status

  Scenario: Delete a project
    Given I have an existing project named "Website Redesign"
    When I navigate to the project management interface
    And I click on the project "Website Redesign"
    And I click on the "Delete Project" button
    And I confirm the deletion
    Then I should see a confirmation message "Project deleted successfully"
    And the project "Website Redesign" should no longer be listed in my projects

  Acceptatiecriteria:
    - De projectmanagementinterface moet toegankelijk zijn voor projectmanagers.
    - Projecten moeten eenvoudig te creëren, bijwerken, bekijken en verwijderen zijn.
    - Er moeten bevestigingsberichten zijn voor elke actie (creëren, bijwerken, verwijderen).
    - De interface moet de status en details van elk project correct weergeven.

  Prioriteit: High
```
